name: Successfail Game
description:
Successfail Game

Rage Game Made For Wowie Game Jam 3.0 With Godot Game Engine

Are you ready to rage? Is so, Successfail Game is ready for you! You are an astronaut and you have to reach the portal at the other site of the level. But be aware that radioactive walls and dazzling lasers are going to hurt you if you hit them.

Remember: The Calmer You Are, The Better.

Controls         WMove UpAMove LeftSMove DownDMove Right
